mapper.select: select trd_list_no , trd_list_name , trd_list_mng_name , trd_list_mng_phone , trd_list_orderdate , trd_list_receivedate from trade_list
select trd_list_no ,trd_list_name , trd_list_mng_name , trd_list_mng_phone , substr(to_char(trd_list_orderdate),1,10) "trd_list_orderdate" from trade_list where trd_list_no=#{trd_list_no}

select * from (select a.*,rownum r_num from (select tl.trd_list_no "trd_list_no" , sp.str_pro_no "str_pro_no" , sp.str_pro_name "str_pro_name" , sp.str_pro_primecost "str_pro_primecost" , nvl(sum(so.str_ord_cnt),0) "sum_cnt" from store_order so, store_product sp, trade_list tl where so.str_pro_no(+) = sp.str_pro_no and sp.trd_list_no = tl.trd_list_no group by sp.str_pro_name, sp.str_pro_no, sp.str_pro_primecost, tl.trd_list_no having tl.trd_list_no = #{trd_list_no} order by "sum_cnt" desc , sp.str_pro_primecost desc) a ) where r_num between 1 and 5
select sum(str_pro_primecost*str_ord_cnt) "total" from (select sp.str_pro_primecost , so.str_ord_cnt from store_product sp, store_order so where sp.str_pro_no = so.str_pro_no)
